channel.title: Exactly why MoparScape will not run in web browsers
channel.description:
MoparScape (or any other private server client) will not run in web browsers because of a thing called [b]Servlets[/b]. Servlets allow servers to run Java applets that use class files in the window. Unless you buy either a dedicated server or you pay big bucks for a host that supports servlets, it will not run.
For more information on servlets, please visit [url=http://www.developer.com/java/ent/article.php/2178651]http://www.developer.com/java/ent/article.php/2178651[/url].
